title: Website Developer
description: Designing and developing responsive, data-driven, and user-centered websites. Experienced in building scalable systems using frameworks like Laravel and integrating efficient backend architectures. Focused on creating digital solutions that balance performance, usability, and aesthetics.

title: Mobile Developer
description: Building intuitive and high-performing mobile applications with frameworks such as React. Skilled in translating complex workflows into seamless mobile experiences while maintaining reliability and speed. Prioritizing accessibility and design consistency across platforms.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Developing intelligent systems that leverage machine learning and graph-based data structures to uncover patterns and generate recommendations. Experienced in data preprocessing, model optimization, and deploying ML-powered applications. Bridging research innovation with practical implementations.
